Submodules¶

her2bdl.data.constants module¶

Data and dataset constants¶

Collections of variables for datasets and data processing.

her2bdl.data.dataset module¶

Dataset setup¶

This module handle data files and generate the datasets used by the models.

her2bdl.data.dataset.aggregate_dataset(dataset, replace_dataset_var=True, filter_selected=True, fix_lowercase=True)¶

Perform simple aggegation to dataset.

Parameters

  • dataset (for example pd.DataFrame) – Dataset.

  • replace_dataset_var (bool) – Replace HER2BDL_DATASET variable

Returns

Dataset with aggregate information.

Return type

pd.DataFrame

her2bdl.data.dataset.describe_dataset(dataset, include_targets=True)¶

Perform simple description of the dataset.

Parameters

  • dataset (pd.DataFrame) – Dataset.

  • include_targets (bool) – Include include_targets in description.

her2bdl.data.dataset.prepare_cv_splits(dataset, k, seed=None)¶

Split dataset into k folds and return cv train/validation datasets. Splits keep class balance.

Parameters

  • dataset (pd.DataFramer) – Original dataset.

  • k (int) – Number of dataset subdivisions and pairs of train/validation datasets.

  • seed (int`or `None) – Split by images

Returns

splits = [(train, val), …]

Return type

list of tuple of pd.DataFrame

her2bdl.data.dataset.save_dataset(dataset, objects=None, output_folder='.', dataset_name='training')¶

Save Dataset. :param dataset: Dataset. :type dataset: pd.DataFrame :param objects: Selected objects. :type objects: pd.DataFrame :param output_folder: Folder containing saved file. :type output_folder: str or Path :param dataset_name: File name or dataset split (i.e. ‘training’). :type dataset_name: str

Returns

Dataset filepath

Return type

str

her2bdl.data.dataset.split_dataset(dataset, validation_ratio=0.1, test_ratio=None, seed=None)¶

Split dataset in train and validation sets (test optional) using events and a given ratio.

This split conserve class balance.

Parameters

  • dataset (pd.DataFramer) – Original dataset.

  • validation_ratio (float) – Portion of images for validation dataset. (default=0.1)

  • test_ratio (float or None) – Portion of images for test dataset. (default=`None`)

  • seed (int`or `None) – Split by images

Returns

train, val or train, val, test

Return type

tuple of pd.DataFrame

her2bdl.data.generator module¶

Data generator to feed models¶

This modele define generator (keras.Sequential) to feed differents models, with their defined input format.

class her2bdl.data.generator.GridPatchGenerator(dataset, batch_size, patch_level, patch_size, patch_vertical_flip=False, patch_horizontal_flip=False, label_mode='categorical', shuffle=True)¶

Bases: tensorflow.python.keras.utils.data_utils.Sequence

Grid patch generator

cleanup()¶

Close opened slides

get_map(group_df, values, resize=None)¶
get_n_partitions(by='CaseNo_label')¶
get_partition(predictions_results, uncertainty_results, by='CaseNo_label')¶

Iterate over dataseta partition corresponding to the same tissue. This is used to aggregate results from patch predictions to tissue predictions.

Parameters

  • predictions_results (dict) – Predictions from an uncertainty model.

  • uncertanty_results (dict) – Uncertainty predicted from an uncertainty model.

  • by (str) – Column name from dataset to generate partitions.

Yields

  • group, group_dataframe, group_predictions_results, group_uncertainty_results

  • A subset of the dataset and results for a group.

load_patch(case_no, row, col, patch_level=None, patch_size=None)¶

Updates indexes after each epoch

her2bdl.data.tissues module¶

Whole Slide Images¶

Collections of function to load and handler WSI.

Resources: - https://openslide.org/api/python - https://developer.ibm.com/articles/an-automatic-method-to-identify-tissues-from-big-whole-slide-images-pt1/ - https://scikit-image.org/docs/stable/auto_examples/segmentation/plot_label.html#sphx-glr-auto-examples-segmentation-plot-label-py -

her2bdl.data.tissues.select_roi_manual(slide, level=None, size=None, include_guess=True, title=None, display=None)¶

Select ROIs from WSI using a GUI. :param slide: Opened WSI. :type slide: openslide.OpenSlide :param size: Thumbnail max size. :type size: tuple(int, int) :param level: Thumbnail level. :type level: int :param include_guess: Include ROIs guesses by thresholding :type include_guess: bool :param display: User interface api. :type display: GUI or None

Returns

ROIs selected and labeled segmentation at level or size given .

Return type

list, np.ndarray(int)
